version.releaseNotes:
Highlights of this Release:

What's New for JIRA Issues
  • Comment field into logWork dialog
  • In-place editing of issue fields
  • Show linked issues
  • Limited support for displaying and editing custom fields
  • Use commit comment as the the work log description
  • Ability to specify time estimate when creating new issues
  • Make it possible to navigate from JIRA issue to Crucuble review
  • When creating a new issue through the plugin, should have the ability to choose security level
What's New for Crucible Reviews
  • Reply to Reply
  • Show versioned comment replies to reply (in review details/files)
  • Add support for creating crucible review when deactivating an issue
What's New for Bamboo
  • Bulk operations on Bamboo builds
  • Logical grouping of builds to form a red/green aggregated
